name: SKY INCOM
description:
Leader in web & mobile apps development industry.
For 15 years we have been providing full range of services for the development, implementation and support of IT solutions. An extensive experience of successful work with world-class companies, independent ratings, recommendations and reviews of reputable companies confirm our high level of professionalism.
Web Development
Development of websites and complex corporate web-systems, as well as e-commerce structures and online stores. The most modern technologies of development and optimization.
Startups
Development of complex solutions, startups and complex web & mobile services - from developing a business model to software implementation and promotion.
Mobile Apps
App Development for iOS and Android. Wide range of turnkey solutions. Hybrid + Native.
Custom Software Development
Software development, integration, automation, innovation.
